page.title: 20Home life continued.
page.content: Where I live on a caravan site you are not allowed any pets and I do not like cats and dogs. In the morning I get the breakfast ready for Janine then I help mummy wash the dishes. I help daddy do the garden and weed it, I sometimes help mummy get the table ready.I helping Mummy get the table ready. I like cooking chicken. Sometimes I wash the car. At home in the morning I go to look what time it is and if it is 7 o'clock I get up and I get my breakfast by getting the milk out of the fridge and then putting it on the side. I climb up the side and get a bowl down and then I put my cornflakes in the bowl and then I pour the milk in and then I get the sugar out I put Half a spoon. In the afternoon I dust and do some polishing.
